name: Listened to Jason Taylor joins the Hurricanes staff + Jake Lichtenstein’s journey to Coral Gables

content.html:
Manny catches up with Carlos Ledo of the MIA All-Day podcast to answer mailbag questions, discuss the additions of Jason Taylor and Rod Wright to Miami’s defensive staff, the start of spring ball on March 7, and Manny’s trip to Lakeland, Fla. to watch Mario Cristobal deliver a speech in front of 2023 5-star cornerback Cormani McClain. New Hurricanes defensive lineman Jake Lichtenstein then joins Manny to discuss his road back home from USC, his relationship with Cristobal and his expectations for the coming season. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

By Wide Right: A show about the Miami Hurricanes
